Description: A unique identifier for the collision record.
The day (yyyy-mm-dd) of the accident.
The time (24 hour) of the accident.
The ZIP code of the location the accident occurred.
Latitude coordinate of the accident.
Longitude coordinate of the accident.
The name of the street the accident took place.
If the accident occurred at an intersection, the cross street will appear here.
If the accident happened on a street, the address of that street will appear in this field.
The total number of people injured in the accident.
The total number of people killed in the accident.
The number of pedestrians injured in the accident.
The number of pedestrians killed in the accident.
The number of cyclists injured in the accident.
The number of cyclists killed in the accident.
The number of motorists killed in the accident.
The number of motorists killed in the accident.
Contributing factor description for the vehicle involved in the crash. (See Enumerations)
Contributing factor description for the vehicle involved in the crash. (See Enumerations)
Contributing factor description for the vehicle involved in the crash. (See Enumerations)
The type of vehicle involved in the crash.
The type of vehicle involved in the crash.
The type of vehicle involved in the crash.
CALCULATED FIELD.  True if a cyclist was killed, false if a cyclist was injured.
